additionalCondition.additionalConditionText: BUYER AND SELLER AGREE AND ACKNOWLEDGE THAT ALL DATA NECESSARY TO COMPLETE THE PROOF OF DELIVERY DOCUMENT, WHICH DOCUMENT IS NECESSARY TO THE SETTLEMENT OF THIS TRANSACTION, SHALL NOT BE INPUT INTO THE TRADECARD PLATFORM DIRECTLY BY THE DEISGNATED LOGISTICS SERVICE PROVIDER BUT SHALL BE ROUTED THROUGH THE SELLER AND FORWARDED TO THE TRADECARD PLATFORM FOR THE PURPOSE OF COMPLETING THE PROOF OF DELIVERY DOCUMENT ON TRADECARD. BY APPROVAL OF THIS PURCHASE ORDER, SELLER AND BUYER AGREE TO THE COMPLETION OF THE PROOF OF DELIVERY DOCUMENT IN THIS MANNER FOR THE TRANSACTION REPRESENTED BY THIS PURCHASE ORDER.

additionalDocumentRequired.name: COMMERCIAL INVOICE COPY, STATING SHIPMENT AUTHORIZATION NUMBER, MANUFACTURER'S NAME, MANUFACTURER'S ADDRESS OR MID #, COUNTRY OF ORIGIN.
CANADA CUSTOMS INVOICE (IF DESTINATION COUNTRY IS CANADA), STATING SHIPMENT AUTHORIZATION NUMBER, MANUFACTURER'S NAME, MANUFACTURER'S ADDRESS OR MID #, COUNTRY OF ORIGIN.

FORWARDER'S CARGO RECEIPT CONSIGNED (IF OCEAN) TO PVH CORP (ANY U.S. ADDRESS ACCEPTABLE) OR PVH CANADA INC (IF DESTINATION COUNTRY IS CANADA), MARKED NOTIFY APPROPRITE BROKER, STATING FULL SET OF ORIGINAL DOCUMENTS EXCEPT INSPECTION REPORT/CERTIFICATE AND C-TPAT SHIPMENT SECURITY FORM.
IN CASE OF AIR SHIPMENT, A RELATIVE AIRWAY BILL CONSIGNED TO PVH CORP (ANY U.S. ADDRESS ACCEPTABLE) OR PVH CANADA INC, MARKED NOTIFY APPROPRITE BROKER.
ORIGINAL SIGNED AND COMPLETED PVH CERTIFICATE OF C-TPAT SHIPMENT SECURITY FORM # 102CTPAT/JW (US DESTINATION ONLY).
COPY OF GENERAL CONFORMITY CERTIFICATE (US DESTINATION ONLY).
COPY OF WEARING APPAREL DETAIL SHEET.
